誅.definition: to put (a criminal) to death; to punish

誅九族.definition: to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)

誅心.definition: to criticize sb for what one believes to be their ulterior motive

誅心之論.definition: a devastating criticism; to expose hidden motives

誅暴討逆.definition: to wipe out the villains (e.g. insurgents, or people of another race)

誅求.definition: exorbitant demands; demanding with menaces; extortion

誅鋤異己.definition: to wipe out dissenters; to exterminate those who disagree
